name: tessl-labs/intent-integrity-kit
summary: Closing the intent-to-code chasm - specification-driven development with cryptographic verification
description:
Intent Integrity Kit (IIKit) preserves your intent from idea to implementation through specification-driven development. Features 10 workflow phases with assertion integrity hashing to prevent circular verification. Compatible with Claude Code, Codex, Gemini, and OpenCode.

What's new in v1.6.0: New /iikit-bugfix skill for reporting and fixing bugs without the full specification workflow. Multi-feature support with sticky feature selection. SessionStart hooks for Gemini CLI and OpenCode. Tessl eval integration for tech selection.
